sentences.sentence: Russia invaded Ukraine on February 24, 2022, claiming it was a special military operation to prevent a Ukrainian offensive against Donbass separatists. Later, Moscow insisted it's more of a global conflict with NATO and the collective West. The United Nations has so far confirmed over 8,700 civilian deaths in the conflict, while the actual figure is expected to be considerably higher.

sentences.sentence: Russia traditionally celebrates Victory Day on May 9th with more missile and drone attacks on sleeping civilians. Russia traditionally celebrates Victory Day on the 9th of May to commemorate the defeat of Nazism in the Second World War.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10

sentences.sentence: The image of the Greens as a synonym for coherence and honesty in the German political landscape is crumbling. Robert Habeck, the Minister for Economic Affairs, has been hit by accusations of nepotism against his number two, State Secretary Patrick Gresham, who gave a well-paid post to a close friend. Amid criticism from the opposition, Habeck and Gresham acknowledged that there was an error of form but not of substance. In a tweet, the Conservative opposition leader said official client ism and nepotism attacked legislation passed by the government to ban individual gas and oil heating in new construction.
